data.name: Bank Bill Business Loan
data.description: A flexible term lending facility of $250,000 or more with market-linked pricing.  Suitable for businesses seeking funding for; business acquisition, expansion, or investment in property, plant or equipment.

features.additionalInfo: Market linked pricing, with simple interest in arrears calculation
Short or long term funding aligned to the life of the underlying asset and/or to match customer cash flow
Variable or fixed rate options available
Variable Rate Facilities: Ability to make additional repayments without penalty
Fixed Rate Facilities : Provides interest rate certainty for the duration of the fixed interest term

Available repayment includes Interest Only, Interest only capitalised (Variable rates Only), Interest only in advance (Fixed rate loans only), Principal and interest with no residual, Principal and interest with a residual balance on interest only, Interest only then principal and interest, Interest only then principal and interest with residual balance and Regular fixed principal payment amounts plus interest payable
Repayment Frequency : Payment periods can be set as: Monthly, Quarterly or Half-yearly
Redraw facility is available for certain draw down arrangements
Supported by specialist relationship managers, locally based in metropolitan and regional centres throughout Australia
Interest rates linked to the bank bill swap rate
Subject to terms and conditions, this product includes extra repayment features.
Subject to terms and conditions, this product includes guarantor features.
Relationship management is available for eligible customers.
Loan term up to 30 years, depending on rate option chosen and security provided

eligibility.additionalInfo: This product is applicable for commercial Banking Industry & Property customers
Applicants may be individuals, businesses, partnerships or trustees
The loan should be used for business and/or investment purposes

Customer should be a business entity domiciled in Australia; or an individual 18 years and above or strata corporation domiciled in Australia and requires the funding for business or investment purposes other than investment in residential property.

fees.name: Line Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Negotiable % p.a. This fee is calculated daily from the date of first drawdown. It is Payable in arrears on the last business day of each repayment period and depends on the facility limit.

fees.name: Loan Service Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable in line with the Repayment Period (i.e. monthly, quarterly, or half-yearly) and is debited from customer's nominated account (For example if quarterly repayments the fee would be $120.00 per quarter) This can be waived with TPC approval.

fees.name: Valuation Costs - Residential Property
fees.additionalInfo: Standard residential valuation costs for business bank are not passed onto the customer.

fees.name: Valuation Costs - Commercial Property
fees.additionalInfo: Commercial valuation report costs will vary between each panel valuer firm.

fees.name: Redraw Fee (Online)
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is applicable per online self-service redraw and payable for each redraw from the facility

fees.name: Redraw Fee (Staff Assisted)
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is applicable per assisted redraw and payable for each redraw from the facility

fees.name: Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we agree to discharge a security linked to the facility

fees.name: Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable where a prepayment is made in advance of the scheduled amortisation arrangements on a Fixed Rate facility. Charged in addition to any Break Costs incurred.

fees.name: Break Cost fee
fees.additionalInfo: Break costs may be incurred when - Changes are made to the repayment type, or the borrower makes repayments in excess of any scheduled repayment arrangements during a fixed interest rate period, even if that repayment is required because they are in default, or the facility is paid out before the expiry of the fixed rate term, or switching all or part of a fixed rate facility to another fixed or variable rate, or if the fixed rate loan is not drawn down in full within 14 days after acceptance. Break Costs are charged in addition to any Administration Fee payable.
